discourse_list.title: EIP-2737: Canonical format for referencing EIPs

content.content: Discussion thread for EIP-2737: Canonical EIP format. TLDR: Always refer to EIPs via the hyphenated form EIP-X instead of EIPX.
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the proposal EIP-2737, which suggests a canonical format for referencing EIPs. The author explains the proposal and suggests that EIPs should always be referred to via the hyphenated form EIP-X instead of EIPX. The post also includes constructive criticism and questions from third parties, but there is no advertising or collaboration mentioned.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This EIP is a duplicate of https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1464. Instead, I’ve opened a PR to update EIP-1 and the EIPs website: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2734
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
